function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-contact interactive activities may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the community.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreak within the community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, promote vaccination, and encourage physical distancing measures.","Technologies":"Contactless technology for community services, air filtration systems, and digital communication tools for virtual interactions.","People":"Residents of the urban community, especially those in close contact with non-contact interactive activities.","Owner":"Community leaders, local health authorities, and urban planners."}]}
